subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
Muslims and Islam
Politics and Government
lead_paragraph: Every participating nation at the London Olympics is expected to field at least one female athlete, including Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Brunei, which have previously sent only male competitors.
snippet: Every participating nation at the London Olympics is expected to field at least one female athlete, including Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Brunei, which have previously sent only male competitors.
